title: Workout Planner App
description: A workout planner app to help you plan your exercises for that day.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A website built entirely in Python to showcase coding projects and apps.

title: PDF Templates
description: A script that generates PDF templates of multiple pages given some predefined guidelines.

title: PDF Invoices
description: A script that reads invoice records from Excel files and automatically generates PDF invoices.

title: Weather Forecast Data App
description: A Streamlit web app leveraging the OpenWeatherMap API to offer customizable weather forecasts, displaying temperature trends or sky conditions for any city over up to five days.

title: Weather API
description: A REST API built with Python and Flask to serve historical weather data for various cities.

title: ATM System
description: A Java-based ATM simulation system featuring user authentication, role-based functionalities, and account management through console-based interactions.

title: Virtual Pet
description: This project is a Java-based console application for managing virtual pets, supporting creation, customization, and serialization for persistent storage.

title: Horse Race
description: This project is a C++ console application that simulates a randomized horse race using object-oriented programming and procedural generation.

title: Student Record
description: This project is a C++ student management system that handles student data, including personal and academic details, through object-oriented design and file I/O operations.

title: Snake Game
description: This C++ project is a Windows console-based snake game featuring dynamic snake movement, food generation, collision detection, and user input handling via the Windows API.

title: Data Parsing and Summation Tool
description: This C++ program sums integers from "input.txt" to replicate text strings into "output.txt", demonstrating basic file and string manipulation.
